reason: Well-structured answer covering 명예퇴직수당 신청절차, 지급시기(2월말/8월말, 퇴직일), 우선고려대상, 특별승진 제외사유. All information verified against page 72. Answer is properly reformulated with organized sections.
Focused answer on priority criteria (상위직, 장기근속, 원로교사) with supporting procedure details. All content verified against page 72. Properly reformulated.
Raw dump - answer is nearly verbatim copy of source text with minimal reformulation. Double colons '::' are formatting artifacts from copy-paste. Only adds intro sentence and '관련 근거' footer.
Duplicate of q_1_0957 - identical answer content. Also raw dump. Question asks about '유의사항' but answer provides no specific precautions, just repeats the same regulation text.
Duplicate of q_1_0957/0958 - identical answer. Bad question: asks about '일수' (number of days) but answer is generic dump of the entire section, not focused on day-related information.
Duplicate of q_1_0957/0958/0959 - identical raw dump answer. Question is also essentially the same as q_1_0962.
Duplicate of q_1_0957/0958/0959/0961 - identical raw dump answer. Question ('어떤 것들이 포함되나요') is essentially the same as q_1_0961 ('해당하는 것들은 무엇인가요').
Bad question - asks about '신청 자격' (application qualification) for 특별승진 제외사유, but 제외사유 is not something one applies for. Answer is a raw dump of the exclusion list with no reformulation.
Duplicate of q_1_0965 - identical answer. Raw dump of 특별승진 제외사유 list. Question is essentially the same topic.
Duplicate of q_1_0965/0966 - identical answer. Raw dump. Question asks when exclusions are 'restricted' which doesn't make sense for exclusion criteria.
